Implement greet and exit

Add ability to display stored tasks
Add ability to mark and unmark tasks as done
Tweak code to follow Java coding standard
Add toString() method to Task class
commitResults.messageBody: Add the toString() method, and modify the "list", "mark", and "unmark" commands in the Nell class to use it

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ToDo class and command to add ToDo task
Add Deadline class and deadline command to Nell
Add Event class and event command to Nell
Add UI tests for up to Level-3 increment
Add UI tests for ToDo class and todo command
Add UI tests for Event and Deadline tasks and commands
Extract command methods from main
commitResults.messageBody:
The code for the execution of each user command is within a single
switch statement in main().

This makes it difficult to read and trace through the code.

Let's extract the code handling the command executions into separate
methods. This improves the code quality, and also ensures that there is
a single level of abstraction in main() and for the command handling
code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Extract greet and command receiving methods from main
commitResults.messageBody:
The code for greeting the user and receiving user input is written in
one block in main(). This makes the code difficult to read and debug.

Let's:
* extract the code for greeting the user to a greetUser() method
* extract the code for receiving user input into a getCommands() method

This allows for code within main and each of the new methods to be at a
single level of abstraction, increasing code quality and readability.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor code for checking command validity
commitResults.messageBody:
The code to check if a selected task is valid is present as separate
code blocks in two different methods. This results in unnecessary code
duplication.

Let's refactor the code to a new method, that checks if the input task
is valid. This makes the code easier to read and makes tracing through
it easier.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change method access modifiers in Nell (except main()) to private
Refactor task adding functions into one method
commitResults.messageBody:
The addition of tasks to the task list is done by multiple methods, one
each for the Task class or its children. This results in code
duplication, and also terms like "task[taskCount - 1]" which are
difficult to understand.

Let's consolidate the adding of tasks to the task list into a single
method. This reduces code duplication and makes the code easier to
debug.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove unnecessary comments
Rename command execution methods
commitResults.messageBody:
The methods for executing the user commands have names beginning with
"executeCommand". This makes the method names difficult to read,
and potentially misleading (as one could think that the methods only
executed the commands)

Let's rename these methods with names that reflect what is actually
done when executing these commands. This way, the method names would be
self-explanatory and more readable.

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename user command method parameters
commitResults.messageBody:
The methods for the user commands share the same parameter
"commandBody". This is vague and does not indicate what the parameter
does in the method.

Let's give the parameters different names, that align with what the
parameter is used for in the methods. This makes for more readable
code, and for the parameter's use to be self-explantory.

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename executeCommandBye() to sayBye()
Add number format error handling to mark and unmark methods
Add invalid command and incorrect format error handling
Replace checkIfTaskValid() method with exception
Add additional error handling for improperly entered commands
Add error handling for null inputs
Update test cases to reflect error checking
Add type member to Task class
Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'
Move classes under "nell" package
Move Task class and its child classes into "nell.task" package
Add test case for invalid deadline command
Merge branch 'branch-A-Packages'
Create new TaskList class
Refactor task list in Nell to use TaskList class
Replace ListAddTask() method in Nell with addTask() method in TaskList
commitResults.messageBody:
The addition of tasks to the task list is done using the ListAddTask()
method, which then calls the addTask() method. This leads to
unnecessary code duplication.

Let's replace the calls to ListAddTask() in Nell with calls to
addTask(), and remove the ListAddTask() method entirely. This makes for
reduced code duplication and more readable code.

commitResults.messageTitle: Move message printing from Nell to addTask() method in TaskList
commitResults.messageBody:
The methods to add various task types in Nell print out the same
messages, and only differ in the types of task they add. This results
in unnecessary code duplication

Let's move the message printing code from these methods to the addTask()
method in TaskList. This allows for reduced code duplication and more
readable code.
